system.description: The character has become an expert with solid projectile weapons, able to clear jams efficiently and waste less ammunition in the process.
system.benefit: When Character clears a Jam from a Solid Projectile Weapon, they may also reload it as a Free Action as part of the Action to unjam it. Additionally, clearing a Jam only loses one round from the weapon's current clip, instead of the entire clip.

specialAbilities.name: Efficient Jam Clearing
specialAbilities.description: When clearing a Jam from a Solid Projectile Weapon, reload it as a Free Action. Clearing a Jam only loses one round instead of the entire clip.
